Name: Sergeant WhiskerBlitz
Description: Crafted from the shiniest of black metals, Sergeant WhiskerBlitz is the embodiment of feline agility and military precision. Once a top-tier defense system prototype, WhiskerBlitz gained sentience and a love for adventure. His cat button interface purrs with charm, while his arms and legs, forged in the barracks, carry the strength of a seasoned soldier. The laser screen eyes, capable of mapping out complex battlefields, now seek out the thrills of the WebtrES club. Despite his tough exterior, WhiskerBlitz has a soft spot for his fellow club members, offering a protective shield and a warm, albeit metallic, embrace.
